headline: 5 Revealing Analyst Questions From Regeneron’s Q3 Earnings Call
summary: Regeneron’s third quarter results were well received by the market, reflecting strong execution in its commercial portfolio and key products. Management attributed the positive momentum to double-digit sales growth for Dupixent, Libtayo, and EYLEA HD, despite flat overall sales. CEO Leonard Schleifer highlighted that Dupixent’s broadening indications and robust uptake across geographies remained a primary growth driver, while EYLEA HD benefited from increased physician demand, partially offset b
